name: Assert the Added Workflow Image for Loan Pre Qualification Intercation

content.title: Assert the Added Workflow Image for Loan Pre Qualification Intercation

stepParameters.customValue: _paragraph("/Complete your loan Pre-qualification Interaction effortlessly using our chat template. Simply set it up to automatically handle queries/")

secondaryParam.customValue: "Complete your loan Pre-qualification Interaction effortlessly using our chat template. Simply set it up to automatically handle queries about Pre-qualification, document submissions, and loans. Add a chat button to your site or publish QR codes in your ads for easy access. Activate this chat automation and let it handle conversations on your website, through texts, or WhatsApp, keeping customers engaged with zero hassle"
